member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to PersistenceWorkerRole -> Run -> Open Service Host.

member.name: T:Contoso.Cloud.Integration.Azure.Services.Persistence.PersistenceService
member.summary: Provides an implementation of the Persistence service that supports the contract.

member.name: M:Contoso.Cloud.Integration.Azure.Services.Persistence.PersistenceService.PersistDataStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Persists the specified stream of data into the queue and returns an unique identify that corresponds to the persisted queue item.
member.param: The stream containing the data to be persisted.
member.returns: The unique identity of the queue item.

member.name: E:Contoso.Cloud.Integration.Azure.Services.Persistence.PersistenceService.PersistDataStreamCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when the entire data stream has been successfully persisted into the underlying durable store.

member.name: T:Contoso.Cloud.Integration.Azure.Services.Persistence.PersistenceWorkerRole
member.summary: Implements a worker role dedicated to hosting of the Persistence service.

member.name: M:Contoso.Cloud.Integration.Azure.Services.Persistence.PersistenceWorkerRole.OnRoleRun
member.summary: Extends the Run phase that is called by Windows Azure runtime after the role instance has been initialized.

member.name: M:Contoso.Cloud.Integration.Azure.Services.Persistence.PersistenceWorkerRole.OnRoleStart
member.summary: Extends the OnStart phase that is called by Windows Azure runtime to initialize the role instance.
member.returns: True if initialization succeeds, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Contoso.Cloud.Integration.Azure.Services.Persistence.PersistenceWorkerRole.OnRoleStop
member.summary: Extends the OnStop phase that is called by Windows Azure runtime when the role instance is to be stopped.
